revised_title: Eyewitness Accounts of a Thunderstorm and Lightning Strike in Everdon, Northamptonshire
tldr: This article recounts a violent thunderstorm and lightning strike in Everdon, Northamptonshire, in 1691, which resulted in the deaths of four people and injuries to eight others. The author provides detailed accounts of the injuries and the aftermath, as well as a discussion of the possible natural causes of the event.
